constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 107 (Thursday, June 23, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. CHU:
H.R. 8201.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Art. 1, Sec. 8 ``The Congress shall have Power To lay and
collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and Excises, to pay the Debts
and provide for the common Defense and general Welfare of the
United States.''
[Page H5878]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: Promoting Health Care Quality Act of 2022
